description: Monocurl is a scripting language (based on the Manim Python library ) and a desktop application. Its primary purpose is to allow science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) enthusiasts to create slides of programmatic animations as if they were using a video editor.
To create an MCF file, select New Scene from the Home screen in Monocurl. You can then configure each slide in the slideshow via the Editor or import media files.
